summary: This document is an email exchange between Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein discussing a potential invitation to a Wall Street screening. The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating that the information may be privileged and is intended for the addressee only.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is reaching out to Jeffrey Epstein regarding an invitation to a screening event.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the recipient of the email and is mentioned as the sender of the previous email.

connections.description: Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein are communicating about attending a social event together.

keyFacts: The email discusses a potential invitation to a Wall Street screening.
The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
The email contains a request for immediate notification if received in error.
